summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.5 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1090 m), feels like temperature (up 2.4°C), outside temperature (up 2.1°C), and inside temperature (up 2.0°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 397.3m higher than yesterday, 479.9m lower than the past week, 1089.8m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 765m minimum and 2220m maximum, with an average of 1663.0m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 2140m and 2750m.
cloud levels.summary: A high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, the air will feel wet and humid. Chance of light rain, a high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions, and sunlight levels will peak at very high intensity. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
